review: Well it worked really well at first but after maybe a week of use for whatever reason you go to watch a show and it just won't play it until you back up to the home screen and navigate back to the show.  You might have to do this 3 or 4 times.  Its strange and I don't totally understand why it does this.  I do like that it change my "less than smart" tv into a smart tv though.

review: I purchased the Amazon Fire TV Stick to replace my Roku Player to stream MLB.TV, thinking that the newer technology would be better. So far, I have been very disappointed. Between the Fire TV Stick and the MLB.TV Premium App, I am experiencing constant buffering and screen freezing. From reading other reviews, this seems to be a frequent problem among users. I have no problems with my internet speed, so that isn't the problem. You really need to fix this problem. I haven't used the Fire TV Stick for any other features.
